Posts.Content: Hello Maryanne no i never heard of that before specially with 2cm. I think the ultrasound maybe more reliable. I would get a copy of the mammogram and the ultrasound and see another Dr. better be safe than sorry.
Posts.Title: breast mass seen as suspicious on ultrasound but normal on mammogram ever happen to anyone?

Posts.Content: The fact the you have a low grade fever and fatigue is not good, the blood work is concering, hon. but it could be some flu bug in yours system as well. I do hope it comes back good.  I did the same thing i picked apart my result until i momerized it, OMG. My biopsy came back neg fibroadenoma. But the dr don't like the way the lump looks he's not comfortable with it so he wants it out right away. I go for surgery on the 29th. what worry me is that the ill feeing i'm getting is not only in my mind but also the dr mind.  But i will stay positive so you do the same girl hang in there and let me know ok.

Posts.Content: 4 loooooong days today is THE day.

Posts.Content: Hi gijoshirl I'm sorry you're going through this but it sound very familar to what i'm going through now. When the Dr did my biopsy the he had trouble getting the needle in my lump as well. I don't know what that means. My lump is 2.3 weith looks longer, it's quite ugly. I get my results tomorrow. I have no family history of breast cancer, i'm tring to stay positive so you do the same my dear.  I will post on my results tomorrow. Hey look me up maybe we can be friends.
Posts.Title: grape size hard mass, waiting on core biopsy results

Posts.Content: well, yes i believe it was good, the lump was not cancer yaay!!!  however he's not convinced that him and the mammogram tech are on the same page. So he sent me back for another mammo. I'm doing it tomorrow and heading back to the dr on Tuesday. He said if it's the same lump then he may just monitor it, i said hellllllll no i want that thing out of me. Thanks for asking.

But keep it together and TRRRRY (LOL) to think posstive thought as hard as it may be, let me know how it turn out i'll say a prayer it that's ok.

Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: yes, denial ia a powerful thing, but i have learned that when it looks like denial to us to that person that's their way of coping with the situation. They face it and deal with it in private it's just they don't let anyone in. which really in a since is betrayal to those closes to them because we are on the outside of their emotion and trying to peek in wanting to share the emotion, but they just won't let us in. Terrible feeing. Just let them know that you are there and wait for them to let you in to that room of thier mind... God bless
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: Hi how the your result come out hope good news for you.
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: I'm praying for you too honey, I don't want to go scripture on you but it does say " if thy right hand offend thee cut it off..." I'm sure you have lots, and lots of people on you side pulling for you and you got us us on this site if others get tired of hearing you we won't cause we are in the same shoe. So fight for life honey it's worth it.
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: Hi the idea of a mastecomy or any cancer surgery is to cut it at the source. If the primery tumor is still there it has chance of flaring up again. Iif that happens it can be harder to treat. so it make sense to eliminate that possiblity. cancer is very sneaky it has to be rooted out. you and your Dr should approach cancer in a very radical way or it will overcome you. Determine and perpose your mind, body and spirit to fight this with all you have, remember its an enemy to your body an enemy who refuses to die so you must be determine to kill it. I have lost far too many people from this foul thing call cancer.

I am not a health care professional. I could be completly wrong glad you can help her better, have a good day all the best.

Posts.Title: mastectomy with liver mets

Posts.Content: Hello Valarie i'm in the same situation i had a mammogram on the 9/6, follow up with a spot compression mamo and an ultrasound on the 9/16 which shows a 2 cm star shape mass with a BI-RADS 4 suspicious for malignancy. I called in for an appointment they told me the 9/25 which feels like forever!!!!  I've been watching a few youtube videos and it seem to me that thing moved a lot fast for alot of other women. To answer NO it does not sound right, i'm going stir crazy. Let me know your out come i"ll be praying for you.
